content.question: All of the following pieces of evidence in the passage directly support the author’s claim that the “pestilence” was “terrible” EXCEPT:

choices.label: The Maya king died in the epidemic.
Fear of the disease drove Maya people to commit suicide.
The disease killed members of the Maya elite, including elders and priests.
The disease led to the arrival of Dominican friars.

content.answer: The disease led to the arrival of Dominican friars.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
